name: Shadow Gladiators
author: NumberOneWaifuIsMercy[Grand]
notes: Tweaked version of Shadow Game Gladiators; Added a second Dimacari to help reduce the monster bricking. Mostly easy time on the ladder against everything not luck-sac-bamboo cancer. Get a life lead and either keep applying pressure or let 'em burn out. Won about a third of my games because of Shadow Games ticking damage.
